name: Booklist | Notion
description: This template assists book lovers in organizing their collection. It helps sort books, add notes, and keep track of ongoing reads. Whether you have a small or large collection, this template provides an efficient way to keep track of all your books, authors, and genres. It also allows you to add notes, bookmarks, and recall important details about each book. This template is a valuable tool for keeping a well-organized book collection and enhancing the reading experience.Automated note - taking
